scripts.preinstall: if [ "$NODE_ENV" != "production" ]; then mkdir -p config && npm run submodule-ci-update && npm run submodule-update && npm run init-submodule; fi
scripts.submodule-update: git submodule foreach -q --recursive 'git checkout $(git config -f $toplevel/.gitmodules submodule.$name.branch || echo master) && git pull'
